data.lyric:
[ti:Bad Liar]
[ar:Imagine Dragons]
[al:Bad Liar]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bad Liar - Imagine Dragons (梦龙)
[00:00.24]Lyrics by：Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Aja Volkman/Jorgen Odegard
[00:00.48]Composed by：Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Aja Volkman/Jorgen Odegard
[00:00.73]Dan Reynolds：
[00:16.52]Oh hush my dear it's been a difficult year
[00:21.87]And terrors don't prey on innocent victims
[00:27.72]Trust me darlin' trust me darlin'
[00:37.22]It's been a loveless year
[00:40.08]I'm a man of three fears
[00:43.43]Integrity faith and crocodile tears
[00:49.24]Trust me darlin' trust me darlin'
[00:57.98]So look me in the eyes tell me what you see
[01:03.80]Perfect paradise tearin' at the seams
[01:08.95]I wish I could escape it I don't wanna fake it
[01:14.57]Wish I could erase it make your heart believe
[01:18.91]But I'm a bad liar bad liar
[01:25.45]Now you know now you know
[01:30.13]I'm a bad liar bad liar
[01:36.22]Now you know you're free to go
[01:40.60]Dan Reynolds/Aja Volkman：
[01:42.92]Did all my dreams never mean one thing
[01:48.19]Does happiness lie in a diamond ring
[01:53.47]Oh I've been askin' for
[01:55.98]Oh I've been askin' for problems problems problems
[02:04.17]I wage my war on the world inside
[02:09.58]I take my gun to the enemy's side
[02:15.00]Oh I've been askin' for
[02:16.57]Trust me darlin'
[02:17.88]Oh I've been askin' for
[02:19.70]Trust me darlin'
[02:20.20]Problems problems problems
[02:23.62]Dan Reynolds：
[02:24.28]So look me in the eyes tell me what you see
[02:29.99]Perfect paradise tearin' at the seams
[02:35.21]I wish I could escape it I don't wanna fake it
[02:40.92]Wish I could erase it make your heart believe
[02:45.17]But I'm a bad liar bad liar
[02:51.64]Now you know now you know
[02:56.37]I'm a bad liar bad liar
[03:02.45]Now you know you're free to go
[03:08.77]I can't breathe I can't be
[03:14.24]I can't be what you want me to be
[03:20.74]Believe me this one time
[03:24.69]Believe me
[03:28.72]I'm a bad liar bad liar
[03:34.69]Now you know now you know
[03:39.45]I'm a bad liar bad liar
[03:45.59]Now you know you're free to go
[03:52.40]Oh oh oh oh oh
[04:04.95]Please believe me
[04:07.57]Please believe me
data.trans:
[ti:Bad Liar]
[ar:Imagine Dragons]
[al:Bad Liar]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.24]//
[00:00.48]//
[00:00.73]//
[00:16.52]噢 嘘别说话亲爱的 真是难熬的一年啊
[00:21.87]恐怖分子不会袭击无辜的平民
[00:27.72]相信我吧 相信我吧 亲爱的
[00:37.22]真是令人心惊胆寒的一年
[00:40.08]我最担心害怕的不过是
[00:43.43]所谓的诚实和信念还有那伪善的泪水
[00:49.24]相信我吧 相信我吧 亲爱的
[00:57.98]就请直视我的双眼 勇敢告诉我你眼中的一切
[01:03.80]憧憬的美好天堂坍塌瓦解 沦为断壁残垣
[01:08.95]多希望我能逃避这残酷现实 但我不愿再自欺欺人了
[01:14.57]多希望我能拭去这支离破碎的一切 让你们能重新相信
[01:18.91]而我并不擅长说谎 不过是个蹩脚骗子
[01:25.45]如今你终于明白 终于知道
[01:30.13]我并不擅长说谎 不过是个蹩脚骗子
[01:36.22]如今你已清楚 来去自由随你吧
[01:40.60]//
[01:42.92]是否我的梦想没有任何意义？
[01:48.19]是否幸福就藏身于钻戒之中？
[01:53.47]噢 我一直苦苦寻觅
[01:55.98]噢 我一直苦苦追寻最终的答案
[02:04.17]我向我的内心世界宣战
[02:09.58]举枪瞄准心底的敌人
[02:15.00]噢 我一直苦苦寻觅
[02:16.57]相信我吧 亲爱的
[02:17.88]噢 我一直苦苦寻觅
[02:19.70]相信我吧 亲爱的
[02:20.20]苦苦追寻最终的答案
[02:23.62]//
[02:24.28]就请直视我的双眼 勇敢告诉我你眼中的一切
[02:29.99]憧憬的美好天堂坍塌瓦解 沦为断壁残垣
[02:35.21]多希望我能逃避这残酷现实 但我不愿再自欺欺人了
[02:40.92]多希望我能拭去这支离破碎的一切 让你们能重新相信
[02:45.17]而我并不擅长说谎 不过是个蹩脚骗子
[02:51.64]如今你终于明白 终于知道
[02:56.37]我并不擅长说谎 不过是个蹩脚骗子
[03:02.45]如今你已清楚 来去自由随你吧
[03:08.77]我已快要窒息 快要窒息
[03:14.24]我不愿变成你期待的样子
[03:20.74]这一次 就请信我吧
[03:24.69]相信我吧
[03:28.72]我并不擅长说谎 不过是个蹩脚骗子
[03:34.69]如今你终于明白 终于知道
[03:39.45]我并不擅长说谎 不过是个蹩脚骗子
[03:45.59]如今你已清楚 来去自由随你吧
[03:52.40]//
[04:04.95]请相信我吧
[04:07.57]请相信我吧
